item.title: Need Help With RS2D!
item.dc:creator: @Impulser Impulser
item.description:
@Impulser wrote:

Hey, i downloaded RS2d just to play about with it (neato peice of work)

i don’t know what im doing wrong. i have tried two ways:

#1:
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Hello World”);

#2:
ActionSender actionSender = new ActionSender(player);
actionSender.sendMessage(“Hello World”);

Preferbably someone who know’s what they are doing could help me?
